text: @GavinNewsom We no longer believe the nos. when, if in fact, MD’s are TOLD!? to write Covid-19 as cause of death in order to obtain taxpayer funds! Wow! So illegal. We personally know a case this just happened; mother died heart attack, MD told fam told to write Covid-19!
